name: Commander James Wright
core_wound: Rose from Level 7 through brutal work and moral compromises, terrified of falling back down, sees lower tiers as what he escaped from
wants: To maintain order and protect upper tier interests, to prove he belongs in Level 3
needs: To confront that he's become the oppressor he once feared, that order isn't justice
voice_markers: Says 'for the good of the station' frequently
contradiction: Genuinely believes he's protecting people but enforces systems that harm them; sees himself as pragmatic but is actually ideological
physical_description: Black man, imposing presence, perfectly maintained uniform, early gray hair, posture like steel, eyes that calculate constantly
flaws: Class traitor - harder on lower tiers because of his own background
Inability to admit when he's wrong
knowledge_state_book1_start: Lower tier culture from lived experience
Upper tier politics and corporate interests

relationships.Nico Chen: Sees him as symptom of lower tier dysfunction, later as threat to station order
relationships.Corporate Council: Reports to them, wants their approval to secure his position
relationships.Maya Torres: Professionally cordial, privately thinks social workers are naive
relationships.His own past: Haunted by where he came from, never speaks of it
